ca.corefacility.gview.map

Class GViewMapFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.map.GViewMapFactory

  • public class GViewMapFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for creating a new gViewMap with the appropriate info.

    • Method Detail

      • createMap

        public static GViewMap createMap(GenomeData genomeData,
                 MapStyle style,
                 LayoutFactory layoutFactory)
        Creates and sets up a new gViewMap from the passed data.
        Parameters:
        genomeData - The data defining the genome.
        style - The style defining how the data should be displayed.
        layoutFactory - An objected used to construct the layout of the GView map.
        Returns:
        The newly created GView map.

      • createMap

        public static GViewMap createMap(Sequence sequence,
                 MapStyle style,
                 LayoutFactory layoutFactory)
        Creates and sets up a new GView map from the passed sequence data.
        Parameters:
        sequence - The sequence data to create the map around.
        style - The style information to build the map with.
        layoutFactory - The LayoutFactory used to construct the layout of the GView map.
        Returns:
        The newly created gview map.

      • createMap

        public static GViewMap createMap(java.net.URI sequence,
                 java.net.URI style,
                 java.util.ArrayList<java.net.URI> gffs,
                 LayoutFactory layout)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 GViewDataParseException
        Creates and sets up a new GViewMap from the parameters provided.
        Parameters:
        sequence - The sequence input.
        style - The style input.
        gffs - The associated GFF files.
        layout - The initial layout.
        Returns:
        The newly created GViewMap.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        GViewDataParseException
